level.heading: SERVICE OF PLEADINGS AND OTHER DOCUMENTS (ยง 14-3803)

level.text: All pleadings and other documents required to be served upon any party under this chapter shall be served upon that party or shall be served upon the representative designated by that party as provided in ยง 3812 or by law to receive service of documents.
When a party has a representative of record as provided in ยง 3812, service shall be made upon the representative.
Service upon a person shall be completed in accordance with ยง 904 of the Act.
Actual receipt of service shall bar any claim of defective service, except for a claim with respect to the timeliness of service.
Service by mail shall be complete upon mailing.
Pleadings and other documents shall be served on the other party or parties prior to or at the same time as they are filed with the Commission.

Proof of service upon parties shall be provided for all pleadings and other documents, shall be in writing, and shall show the date, person served, address at which service was made, and the manner of service.
